description: Network request exceeded the timeout limit. Common with slow connections or unresponsive servers.
commonCauses: Server taking too long to respond
solutions: Increase timeout values appropriately (connect vs read timeout)
Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
Cancel long-running requests when user navigates away
Use OkHttp with proper timeout configuration
prevention: Use WorkManager for critical background requests
Implement request cancellation on lifecycle events
Monitor network state before making requests
Use retry policies for non-critical requests
